summary: Completed frontend testing of Schooltino school management system. Core authentication, school creation, and navigation flows are working correctly. The previous React runtime error has been resolved. Session persistence between automation calls needs improvement for complete end-to-end testing.

ui_bugs.issue: Authentication session does not persist between separate browser automation calls
ui_bugs.impact: Prevents complete end-to-end testing in multiple automation sessions

ui_bugs.issue: Dropdown selectors in Add Class dialog may have complex interaction patterns
ui_bugs.impact: Class creation form interaction needs specific selector handling

passed_tests: User Authentication and JWT Token Handling
Automatic Redirect to Dashboard After Registration
Dashboard Load with 'No School Selected' Message
Toast Notification System (No React Object Errors)
